title: So, I just started playing hearthstone like 2 days ago
body:
Had a warrior summon a siege commander or whatever its called, gave all allies with 3 or less damage charge. He then proceeded to summon one card with 3 AD, attacked my minion, another one showed up... this repeated several times until I had no minions left, and he got 9 minions in a single turn.

Is this shit normal? Also whats a good way to expand/improve my huntard deck without dropping a single penny on this game?
